attributes.action: Make a NHS but for animals, ‘PHS’
attributes.additional_details: A couple of extra pound out of everyone’s pockets which you will barely notice, could save many family memebers, if we have a national health service then why can’t we have a PETS HEALTH SERVICE, I’m hoping this can be a bigger and better future for the safety and wellness of our loved ones as well as the owners
attributes.background: Hello all, I have realised that a lot of people in the UK has pets, I would like to make awareness for this as a lot of people generally can’t afford vets bills given how overpriced they are!
